title: Select which contacts to show in "Phone" app's contacts
content:
Hello everyone,

I am trying to get the Google "Phone" app to display only contacts from a specific third-party address book, not any contacts from my Google Account. In "Google Contacts" app I can easily select which contacts (= address books) to show with a simple setting in the search bar at top. Unfortunately, I can't seem to find any such setting in the "Phone" apps contacts, which shows contacts from all address books - surprisingly without any duplicates, though.

Is there any way to show only contacts from third-party address book in "Phone" contacts? Or, if it's easier the other way around, can I hide all Google Account contacts in "Phone" app?

Any help would is highly appreciated. Thanks in advance!
